table_description: Represents an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) service principal.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The display name for the application.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the application.

columns.name: app_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the application that is assigned to an application by Azure AD.

columns.name: created_date_time
columns.description: The date and time the application was registered. The DateTimeOffset type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Free text field to provide a description of the application object to end users.

columns.name: is_authorization_service_enabled
columns.description: Is authorization service enabled.

columns.name: oauth2_require_post_response
columns.description: Specifies whether, as part of OAuth 2.0 token requests, Azure AD allows POST requests, as opposed to GET requests. The default is false, which specifies that only GET requests are allowed.

columns.name: publisher_domain
columns.description: The verified publisher domain for the application.

columns.name: sign_in_audience
columns.description: Specifies the Microsoft accounts that are supported for the current application.

columns.name: api
columns.description: Specifies settings for an application that implements a web API.

columns.name: identifier_uris
columns.description: The URIs that identify the application within its Azure AD tenant, or within a verified custom domain if the application is multi-tenant.

columns.name: info
columns.description: Basic profile information of the application such as app's marketing, support, terms of service and privacy statement URLs. The terms of service and privacy statement are surfaced to users through the user consent experience.

columns.name: key_credentials
columns.description: The collection of key credentials associated with the application.

columns.name: owner_ids
columns.description: Id of the owners of the application. The owners are a set of non-admin users who are allowed to modify this object.

columns.name: parental_control_settings
columns.description: Specifies parental control settings for an application.

columns.name: password_credentials
columns.description: The collection of password credentials associated with the application.

columns.name: spa
columns.description: Specifies settings for a single-page application, including sign out URLs and redirect URIs for authorization codes and access tokens.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: Custom strings that can be used to categorize and identify the application.

columns.name: web
columns.description: Specifies settings for a web application.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTenant
